content: >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version gauge worked in pattern 4 small clusters and 8 row = 3 inches size instructions are for girl s size small 6-8 instructions for medium 10-12 and large 14 are in parenthesis >note from designer i originally designed this 10 years ago the pattern calls for lion brand jiffy but i really like it in sandy s version using joann sensations rainbow classic and i preferred to use her photo as shown since i designed it 10 years ago it was before i started drawing schematics it s one of the designs i would like to rework to make sure that my measurements were correct
